text:
Europa League
Vitoria Guimaraes - Arsenal streaming: where to see the match?
Arsenal are on the pitch of Vitoria Guimaraes for this match of the 4th day of the Europa League. A meeting broadcast live on French television, on the RMC Sport 2 channel this Wednesday, November 6, 2019, but also to follow streaming on iPhone, iPad, Android, PC and Mac in particular.
06 Nov 2019, 05:15 by Hugo Deloraine



ArsenalAn unfortunate finalist of the last Europa League, the Arsenal Gunners will again try their luck in the second European competition. And find the Champions League through the championship.Icon Sport



Bernd LenoIcon Sport



Nacho MonrealIcon Sport



Shkodran MustafiIcon Sport



Sokratis PapastathopoulosIcon Sport



Ainsley Maitland-NilesIcon Sport



Granite XhakaIcon Sport



Lucas TorreiraIcon Sport



Mesut √ñzilIcon Sport



Pierre-Emerick AubameyangIcon Sport



Alexandre LacazetteIcon Sport



Alex IwobiIcon Sport

Arsenal: the possible eleven of the season




In the first leg, a fortnight ago, the Vitoria Guimaraes lost 3-2 thanks to a doubling of Nicolas Pepe especially for the Gunners. Arsenal, leader of Group F with 3 victories in as many days will want to continue its momentum to achieve the perfect course in the Europa League. The match will take place at Alfonso Henriques stadium.







The F group calendar




Emery + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Standard Liege 2-0 Vitoria SC
Frankfurt 0-3 Arsenal

Vitoria Guimaraes - Arsenal Streaming





+12 üì∑
Credit Photo - Icon Sport


In France, this Vitoria Guimaraes - Arsenal is broadcast live on television on RMC Sport 2 from 16:50. If you can not access the RMC Sport subscription on your television, know that there is an alternative: the 100% digital subscription to watch all the games and programs streaming on many supports (the list below). This OTT subscription to RMC Sport is available at a price of 9 euros for SFR subscribers, 19 euros per month without commitment / 25 euros per month without commitment for non-subscribers to the operator.
Discover below the list of supports to watch RMC Sport streaming:


iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch


Android


PC / Mac via Internet browser type Chrome, Safari, Microsoft Edge

Chromecast, Apple TV, Samsung Smart TV, Nvidia Shield, Philips with Connect TV option
